comments:
I took the latest code from CVS, compiled with java 1.4.2 SDK then did an Export > Deployable Plugins for the validator and SMLIF.

I've exported the two under a basic Eclipse, running with java 5.  I open this eclipse, select Export > SMLIF and get this error

I believe this is fixed.  It was tricky to find the right place to put the jars in the path.  It might be that they are specified in too many places, but it works.  I tested in both the runtime workspace, and also going through the steps you outlined.
fixed, jdk 1.4.2 no longer used in development
